sentences.english: "If you had told me that there was a claim of faster-than-light electrons, I would be a lot more skeptical," he says.
sentences.chinese: 如果你和我说的是存在大于光速的例子，我会更不信。

sentences.english: The velocity of light is the ultimate speed limit, being part of the very structure of space and time.
sentences.chinese: 作为时空结构的一部分，光速是终极速度极限。

sentences.english: Possibility of superlight velocity are discussed within the framework of relativistic theory.
sentences.chinese: 本文在相对论的理论框架内讨论“超光速”的可能性。

sentences.english: I have got on this light-speed train to explore my destination.
sentences.chinese: 我已踏上这辆超光速列车，去探索我的落脚点。

sentences.english: Superluminal motion corresponds with negative mass and negative energy.
sentences.chinese: 超光速运动对应负质量和负能量。

sentences.english: At least, in weak interaction, neutrinos may be superluminal particles.
sentences.chinese: 至少在弱相互作用中，中微子可能是超光速粒子。

sentences.english: And not used in micro field of the speed of light.
sentences.chinese: 而不适用于超光速的微观领域。

sentences.english: Huang Zhixun 《Study of Superluminal》BeiJing, Science Press, 1999
sentences.chinese: 黄志洵《超光速研究》北京，科学出版社，1999。

sentences.english: Will Hikari be able to help Shinko retrieve the two Pokémon?
sentences.chinese: 将光速能够帮助新光检索两个神奇宝贝？

sentences.english: So far we have only been considering sex at sub-light velocities.
sentences.chinese: 到这里，我们还只是探讨了亚光速的性爱。

sentences.english: A virtual particle may also be viewed as superluminal one.
sentences.chinese: 一个虚粒子也可以看作是超光速粒子。

sentences.english: The speed of light is widely regarded as the Universe's ultimate velocity limit.
sentences.chinese: 光速被广泛认为是宇宙中速度的极限。

sentences.english: The ship has a class two hyperdrive.
sentences.chinese: 该飞船有二级超光速推进器。

sentences.english: FYI: Can Anything Move Faster Than Light? By Sarah Fecht
Stopped players moving back into onside positions at unrealistically fast speed.
sentences.chinese: 消灭了球员会以光速往回跑到不越位的位置的情况。

sentences.english: Faster-than-light speed does not cause time goes back.
sentences.chinese: 超光速不会导致时间回流。

definition: neutrino (particle physics)/also written 微中子[wei1 zhong1 zi3]
